headings: Develop the skills you need to serve as a strong, effective administrator.
Admission Requirements, Degree Plan and Courses
What Can You Do With an Administrative Leadership Degree?
Why Earn My Administrative Leadership Degree at Angelo State?
Engagement in a Professional Learning Community
paragraphs: In our program, you will discover and develop your administrative and leadership strengths in all areas of an organization.

Our 100% online program can be completed in as quickly as one year. Explore topics ranging from managing human resources, leading departments, organizations and institutions, and overseeing professional development and training - to evaluating how organizations fit within communities and designing organizational structures. You’ll also learn various leadership skills, like leading remotely, leading through change and leading to make a difference.
Our faculty members don’t just know the field, they are actively involved. Access to faculty is timely, intentional and focused on relationship building throughout the program and beyond.
Tuition & FeesWe don’t sacrifice quality for affordability. Angelo State is committed to helping you achieve your educational goals with as little debt as possible.

ASU Distinguished Graduate ScholarshipsEarn our premier graduate scholarship based on your highest degree GPA. Once you are admitted to an ASU graduate program, you will automatically be considered. No application is necessary.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.

You will be prepared for advancement/promotion into administrator/leadership roles, including such positions as assistant directors, associate directors, directors, chairs and deans, in the fields of education, higher education, nonprofit organizations, corporations and private businesses; any industry/organization seeking leadership.

Application-based assignments throughout each course challenge learners to apply what you are learning in real-world environments and scenarios, making the learning experience meaningful. Relevant resources help you implement concepts in their professional setting.

You apply your own professional goals to assignments throughout the program, allowing you to create tools you can utilize in your particular profession. You have the flexibility of crafting assignments based on the profession you are seeking, not necessarily where you are now, providing greater application and preparation for future goals.

Courses are designed so you experience an environment centered on faculty support. While this is an online program, communication and relationship development are the center of course design and implementation, creating a unique environment for you to engage with others. In addition to faculty engagement, you will experience student-to-student interaction throughout each online course, developing relationships and gaining insights.

Whether you’re pursuing a master’s degree, doctoral degree or certificate/certification, you have access to all the services in ourCollege of Graduate Studies and Research. You’ll find information and resources for everything from registering for classes and writing a thesis – to available graduate/teaching assistantships and graduate research opportunities.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
